variants.description: Manage product variants and their attributes

dialogs.deleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. The variant will be permanently deleted.
dialogs.bulkDeleteDesc: You are about to delete {0} variants. This action cannot be undone.

createProductVariant.title: Créer une variante de produit
createProductVariant.description: Ajoutez une nouvelle variante de produit et définissez ses attributs et informations de stock.

hints.isActive: Si désactivé, il ne sera pas visible

editProductVariant.title: Edit Product Variant
editProductVariant.description: Update the product variant information and attributes.

fields.name: Name (Optional)
fields.nameDescription: A descriptive name for this variant. If not provided, it will be auto-generated.
fields.attributesDescription: Define attributes like size, color, material, etc.
fields.sortOrderDescription: Used to control the display order of variants.
fields.isActiveDescription: Whether this variant is active and available for use.

app.title: Sky's Store - Open Source E-commerce Platform
app.description: Sky's Store is a modern, extensible open source e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Prisma. It offers features like product management, order processing, and user authentication.

page.description: Manage user roles and configure permission-based access control
